Service Details: - Facilitates women's economic empowerment and community capacity building agenda in rural Ghana- Programs include adult education as well as school lunch program, that provides children a hot lunch 3 times per week- Income generating activities such as micro loans, a herd-increasing goat project, and a donkey and cart project- Health initiatives such as building a Community Health Centre, and providing mosquito nets to fight Malaria- Girl-Child Fun, which focuses on sponsoring girls who otherwise lack the opportunity to attend school
